body.name: Clip On Lavalier Lapel Microphone 2 Pack Set for iPhone and Android Vlogging, Interview, Selfie Videos
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 3 mins
features: Our dual lavalier microphone allows 1 or 2 participants to be recorded in crystal clear sound without background noise.

Simple to use. Plug 59” mic cable jack directly into device or plug into 79” extension cord that plugs directly into device. Clip the mic on your shirt and press record. If it’s windy, use the wind muff for better sound.
For dual recording, plug each 59” mic cable jack directly into Y- connector that plugs directly into device. Use 3.5mm TRRS to TRS connector for laptop / pc / camera.

Use the lapel microphone for iPhone iOS 6, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XR, XS, XS Max, and Android. PC, Mac, Tablets, Chromebook, DSLR Video Camera. For iPhones with no headphone jack, you will need an Apple Lightning to 3.5 mm Headphone Jack Adapter (SOLD SEPERATELY).
body.description: Are you in need of a reliable lavalier microphone for your voice recordings? Feeling frustrated from the poor quality sound of your current built-in microphone? Disappointed by not having a long enough jack cable that gives you freedom of movement or missing adapters? The LiBa Professional Lavalier Lapel Microphone Set is the ANSWER to your problems!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to use for virtual presentations, and meeting. Also using them for school projects as well. Highly recommended product. Audio quality is great! Lightweight, easy to pack and comes with more assessories than expected!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality mics for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: You'll never not have background noise such as humming, static, etc. no matter which mic you purchase, that's why there is such thing as post-production in audio. To get crisp quality using these mics, you can add the following audio effects to your track:- Denoiser (light noise reduction)- DeReverb (light reverb reduction)- Multiband Compressor (enhance highs)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought them for a school project, and they worked great for the purpose. We had a bit of an issue of setting them up, but it wasn't too big of a deal. Sadly, they aren't the most durable, and easily broke over time. I use it as a microphone for my computer, it isn't the most ideal, since it has caused them to break much more. The cord started to get pulled out and the clip broke. They work for the price, and it is what you pay for, but I would reccomend if you need a cheap and quick solution to microphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks solid, different cable combinations possible
reviews.reviewText: Looks solid (pun intended). Thoughtful design: you can use different combinations of the extension cables, so the mics can be either of the same length, or one is super long and the other one is short. No noticeable sound degradation or attenuation for the longest possible extension. When you are using one mic only, you can just plug it directly to the phone, bypassing the V-branching.Included are two spare mic covers, a nice pouch, and an adaptor that's not needed for standard Android phone.There's a very slight crackling sound from the mic particularly in a quiet environment, but is quite acceptable.The standardization of plugs makes it very easy to combine mics of different brands and hear the difference, if any. I bought two pairs of mics of different brands, and you can interchange all the parts with no problem.I haven't tried it in open air with all the wind noise. Will update if there's anything worth mentioning.Note: when testing the mics, don't forget to unplug the cable from the phone first to hear the recorded sound :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you connect them tight all the way!
reviews.reviewText: I don't often write reviews, but in this case these mics give me such a pleasant surprise that I want to leave a review. When I opened them I tested them first on my phone. They did NOT work. I was displeased. I tried them on my computer next. Still didn't work. So then I tried each piece individually to see where the short was. Turns out that I didn't SNAP all the connections completely tight. They snap ALMOST all the way and they look like they are connected but they aren't. So be sure you push hard on each connecting point until they snap all the way tight. With all the connections sure, I tested them again and everything works great. The quality of the sound sound is excellent. The wire size is small and looks a little fragile like a headphone wire might, so you should be careful not to snag, pull or roll over these wires just in case. Now to take these mics into the field and see how they work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little disappointed
reviews.reviewText: The audio quality is fair for the price. Sounds clear enough for a decent video and it does cancel some background noises. Cords have a good legth, which will allow you to be creative on your video projects.But I found two problems:1. The splitter, one microphone and one extension cord are hard to click, as if they don't fit correctly. This is bad to a point in which it feels like it's going to break but once they are finally connected, they work just fine.2. It does not work with my huawei p10 lite which is my main tool to produce my videos. It did work with my sister's phone (LG) and with a Lenovo Laptop, but it's very disappointing that it will not work for the purposes I had in mind at firts.Unfortunately I am back to a location where I can not send it back to get a replacement.My advice is: buy it only if you are willing to risk that money since it might not work for your phone.If it does work, it's a very good product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mics - Good Quality with Great Sound Quality as well
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Lavalier Lapel Microphone 2 Pack set because my family is regularly on Zoom calls with Friends and Family. I tried out USB Speakerphones but nothing really worked well. I ended up trying these out.They are perfect! On my MAC and Windows PC, just plug in the 4 pin to 3 pin adapter, then plugin the Y cable into that and boom - you can plugin the two mics. The extension cables allow us to sit a long way away from the computer yet still have the Lapel Mic clipped onto our shirts for great sounding mics. I think it's a perfect purchase and well worth the cash.I'm actually going to purchase another set to use for my work computer where I'm on Zoom calls all day. Probably a little overkill, however, having the extra 4 pin to 3 pin adapter will be nice as will the Y splitter cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The clips don't even work...
reviews.reviewText: Looked like a good item. Adequate packaging. Even after opening the envelope the items looked just as "pictured". But as soon as I tried to clip one on I found the clips were frozen junk...unusable. Then I noticed the foam mic muffs were hardened as if they were very old. Disappointed and returning this item. I hate these moments of disappointment. UPDATE: It was too much trouble to "return" this item during this holiday season so ordered a set of clips for these mics. Then, when I could not remove the mics from the frozen, useless metal clips they came with, I used a rotary tool from Amazon and a diamond blade to cut off the clips. The ROTARY TOOL worked just fine. (I'm still impressed with the Amazon rotary tool) A sad experience but true.

reviews.reviewTitle: You really can't go wrong for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I read some negative reviews on here, but don't worry yourself, this is a great product, if you know anything about audio production (and even if you don't) these are a breeze to use and set up. There are plenty of ways to get these to work, I was using a pretty modern phone during my brief test but there are many ways to use these so if it doesn't work at first don't be mentally lazy and play around with different options because my experience has been excellent. Sound quality is amazing and for the price of one of these mics it's a steal but you get 2 and all the extensions and adapters you need for a 2 person interview, if you're looking to conduct interviews or have sit down discussions for this price you really can't go wrong.
The clips on the mics were stuck and could not be opened when I received it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing with long leads and bag.
reviews.reviewText: Works exceptionally well, includes attached velcro cable ties and a bag.Very long extension cables and long leads to lapel mics. Solid construction and good setup.
Great value! Comparable to some options double the price, and you’re getting two.
